Class Body

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
      • structures.Body
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, Moon

    public class Body
extends CircularShape
    A Body is the default class for an object that is representing a Planet.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis
